properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. MAN OVERBOARD FROM VESSEL. LAST KNOWN POSITION
   IN 21-49.97S 040-48.94W ON 16 NOV.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
   LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO ANY COASTAL RADIO STATION.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3553/18.
